Package pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic

Class SortingMadnessHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic.SortingMadnessHelper
  • @Service
public class SortingMadnessHelper
extends Object
    Logic class that parses JSON input, delegates sorting and then composes JSON output.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aleksandra Kiel

    • Method Detail

      • fillSorter

        private void fillSorter​(ChooseSorter chooseSorter,
                        String sortingAlg)
                 throws InvalidSorterException
        Chooses sorter based on input string value.
        Parameters:
        chooseSorter - ChooseSorter object for which the sorting algorithm will be set.
        sortingAlg - name of the algorithm.
        Throws:
        InvalidSorterException - thrown when chosen sorting algorithm does not exist.

      • getBooleanValueOfDirection

        private Boolean getBooleanValueOfDirection​(String directions)
        Translates String representation of direction into Boolean. ASC = true DESC = false If input string doesn't match the two given options it defaults to ASC.
        Parameters:
        directions - String representation of direction.
        Returns:
        Boolean representation of direction.

        Returns:
        Parsed list of JSONObjects.
